resources.string:
Mobile agent for the open source Android remote control service.

Version: %s

Variant: %s

(c) 2020 apuppet.org
Tap Home to hide the screen. To stop screen sharing, open the plugin activity through the "Recents" button.
Accessibility service is used to simulate touch screen events for remote control of the device.
Reset the server URL and secret to their default values?
Please enter a correct server URL starting with http:// or https://
Please enter a non-empty device name
This app uses accessibility service to simulate user interface events. The accessibility permissions screen will now open. Please grant accessibility permissions to the "aPuppet" app.
There was an error connecting to %s. Please check your Internet connection and try again.
Ready to be remotely controlled. Please send the server URL (%s), session ID, and password to the supervisor.
A supervisor (%s) is remotely controlling your device!
Gracefully closing the connection, please wait...
You cannot change settings when your device is controlled. Please stop the remote controlling first.
Please allow this app to record audio so your voice can be translated to the supervisor.
Session aborted because the screen cast permission not granted. Please allow screen sharing to enable the remote control session!
Attempt to share the screen is failed! Looks like the app is not compatible with your device, sorry for that!
To show a flashing dot when the device is controlled, the app needs to draw overlays. Please click "Continue" and grant this permission to the "aPuppet" app.
Setting \"Flash when sharing\" improves screen sharing quality.
Failed to establish connection due to an internal error. Please retry, or exit the app and try again.
Please connect to my Android device (%s) remotely using the aPuppet service: %s
Failed to share a link, please contact the technical support!
The application is idle and will be stopped in %d sec!
The application is stopped because it\'s idle!
The remote control session is stopped because there\'s no connection with the server!
